message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Alice, $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $110. Let me know what you think.
I understand that $150 is a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $110. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $130.
Alice, $130 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable paying.  I'm willing to go up to $115.  This is my final offer.
I'm not willing to go as low as $115, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $125. This is my final counteroffer.
